text: Xindao de renmen a! Nimen buyao zebei shou shi de ren he sunhai ta, er shi nimen de shishe bian wei wuxiao, youru wei guming er shishe caichan, bing buxin zhenzhu he houshi de ren yiyang. Ta piru yige guanghua de shitou, shangmian puzhe yiceng futu, yizhen dayu guohou, shi ta bian de you ying you hua. Tamen buneng huode tamen suo shishe de renhe baochou. Zhenzhu shi bu yindao bu xindao de minzhong de.
